text: Egypt national football team is the national football team of Egypt. == Most appearances == # Player Caps Goals Career 1 Ahmed Hassan 184 33 1995–2012 2 Hossam Hassan 178 68 1985–2006 3 Essam El-Hadary 144 0 1996–2018 4 Ibrahim Hassan 131 14 1988–2002 5 Hany Ramzy 123 3 1988–2003 6 Wael Gomaa 114 1 2001–2013 7 Ahmed El-Kass 112 25 1987–1997 7 Abdel-Zaher El-Saqqa 112 4 1997–2010 9 Ahmed Fathy 110 3 2002– 10 Rabie Yassin 109 1 1982–1991 == Top scorers == # Player Goals Caps Goals ratio Career 1 Hossam Hassan 68 178 0.38 1985–2006 2 Mohamed Salah 57 89 0.56 2011– 3 Hassan El-Shazly 42 62 0.67 1961–1975 4 Mohamed Aboutrika 38 100 0.38 2001–2013 5 Ahmed Hassan 33 184 0.18 1995–2012 6 Amr Zaki 30 63 0.48 2004–2013 7 Emad Moteab 28 70 0.40 2004– 8 Ahmed El-Kass 25 112 0.22 1987–1997 9 Gamal Abdelhamid 24 79 0.30 1979–1993 10 Mahmoud El Khatib 24 54 0.44 1974–1986 == References == Category:African national football teams Category:Football in Egypt Category:Sports organizations based in Egypt
